82  chaos::uint64 register_function(
83  void (*callback_function)(function_parameters...))
84  {
85  // increment the global callback id and use it as this callback id
86  chaos::uint64 id = g_next_callback_id++;
87  // this callback shouldn't be registered
88  assert(m_callback_funcs.find(id) == m_callback_funcs.end());
89  // store this function mapped under the id
90  m_callback_funcs[id] = callback_function;
91  return id;
92  }
93
